item.title: Philosophical diversity, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on the hazards that philosophical diversity poses to education.
item.dc:creator: University of Chicago
item.dc:subject: Civilization--Philosophy.

item.title: Social and political conformity, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, presents a lecture on the hazards that social and political conformity present to education.
item.dc:creator: University of Chicago
item.dc:subject: Conformity.

item.title: Industrialization, part one

item.dc:subject: Industrialization--United States.

item.title: Specialization, part two

item.dc:subject: Expertise.
